transcript_chunks.text: we have Spider-Man 2 Tim what do you give it on the kind of funny review scale I'm giving this a five out of five Spider-Man 2 is an all-timer for me I feel like this has now cemented the fact for my taste in video games literally no one does it better than ziac they have risen the ranks and are now one of the greatest developers to ever do the damn wow and this game in particular I I can say without a Shadow of Doubt I have never enjoyed exactly what I was doing as much as I did in this game for 30 hours as I H % of this you Platinum this I did Platinum this because I just enjoy it that much what elevates this above 2018 Spider-Man this is the best example of a PlayStation 5 game that we have seen thus far the use of the Dual sense when it comes to what they're doing with the solid state drive the fast travel system in the low times don't exist they're just not there in the moments that weren't our favorites from the other games there's less of them it's the perfect balance of what I

drive the fast travel system in the low times don't exist they're just not there in the moments that weren't our favorites from the other games there's less of them it's the perfect balance of what I loved most about Spider-Man with surprises consistently throughout the way
